prompt:
Patient: Hello?

Nurse: Hi, this is Rachel calling from O'Connor Hospital. I'm an AI on a recorded line. Is this Jon Chavez?

Patient: Yeah. That's me.

Nurse: Thank you for confirming. Could you please provide your date of birth for verification purposes?

Patient: May fourth nineteen sixty five.

responses.gpt4:
Great, thank you for the confirmation, Jon. I am your chronic care management support line calling on behalf of your primary care provider, Dr. Robert Jackson. I'm here to check in on how you've been doing and discuss a few items on your health. You can ask me any questions you have at any time during this call.

To start, I'm interested to know how you have been feeling lately?
responses.our_model: Thank you for confirming that. I'm calling on behalf of your primary care doctor, Doctor Robert Jackson, to check in on you. How have you been doing lately?
